programme.title: Sherni
programme.desc: After seing her family get murdered and the local police refusing to get involved with the fear of crossing the wrong man a young woman named Durga picks up the gun and chooses a criminal lifestyle to avenge the death of her family.

programme.title: Antenna
programme.desc: Two Ladakhi kids go on a tumultuous adventure when they try to raise money for a TV antenna and cross paths with three thieves.

programme.title: Geet
programme.desc: A renowned singer, Neha (Divya Bharti), loses her ability to sing after being poisoned by her former manager. However, a commoner Rajesh (Avinash Wadhavan) who has been an admirer of Nehaâ€™s voice feels determined to help her get better. Does he succeed in getting the singer back on stage?

programme.title: Dosti: Friends Forever
programme.desc: Karan, a wealthy young boy lives with his emotionally unavailable parents. One day, when he meets with an accident, a homeless orphan named Raj saves his life which gives rise to their unending tale of friendship and brotherhood.

programme.title: Jaanwar
programme.desc: A perilous criminal Sultan raises an orphan, who also grows up to become a criminal, known as Badshah. Badshah changes his ways after he falls in love with a street performer Sapna, but Sultan returns to remind Sultan of his past.

programme.title: Mujhse Shaadi Karogi
programme.desc: Sameer, a hot-tempered guy relocates to Goa, where he falls in love with Rani. However, his new roommate Sunny puts a spoke in the wheel upon his arrival and Rani finds herself in a dilemma as she starts liking both Sameer and Sunny.

programme.title: Baatein Kahi Ankahi
programme.desc: Watch Baatein Kahi Ankahi with RJ Anmol In An Exclusive Interview With Bollywood Stars.

programme.title: Abhimaan
programme.desc: Subir, a popular singer in show business, encourages his wife and a talented singer, Uma to take up singing as a career. However, his pride is wounded and their marital bliss is threatened when Uma's popularity surpasses his own.
